hero.title: Quality through
hero.description3: with passion, experience and education. In my work I create simple and advanced mobile applications and websites. I help in project analysis, UI/UX creation, programming, testing, up to maintenance. I am happy to share my knowledge and learn from others.

about.title: About me
about.description1: I am an experienced developer who specializes in mobile applications, websites and providing other IT solutions. I have five years of commercial experience in the industry, and I always strive to understand my clients' needs and provide quality solutions that exceed their expectations.

values.title: My values
values.description: Values are fundamental to me in my work and in my interactions with clients. I believe they are essential to building business relationships.

specialties.title: Specialties
specialties.description: I am a flexible developer providing customer support in many fields. Experience at every stage of project development means you don’t have to look for additional people.

specialty1.title: Mobile development
specialty1.description: I make advanced mobile applications for Android and iOS using cross-platform technologies.
specialty1.technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, React Native, MobX, Redux, Redux Saga, React Native Testing Library, Detox, Java, Objective-C

specialty2.title: Web development
specialty2.description: I create modern, visually attractive and effective web systems that meet high standards.
specialty2.technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, ReactJS, NodeJS, Strapi, NestJS, NextJS, Gatsby, MobX, Redux, Redux Saga, Tailwind, React Testing Library, WDIO

specialty3.title: UI/UX Design
specialty3.description: I create eye-catching designs for mobile and web applications based on the needs of end users.
specialty3.technologies: Adobe XD, Figma, Material UI, Tailwind UI

specialty4.title: Know-how
specialty4.description: I help deliver new technology solutions, select the tools that fit your needs, and enjoy sharing knowledge.
specialty4.technologies: Publication in Google Play, App Store and Microsoft Store, ML algorithms, BLE devices, code audits, image processing and much more

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Without working on products used by users we cannot talk about gaining experience. My experience is based on working with real problems, communicating with other people and providing solutions that will meet users’ expectations.

education.title: Education
education.description: Education is very important to me. Learning about theory and new ways to solve problems has real benefits in practice. Advanced solutions increase productivity, solution efficiency and are often the answer to customer needs.

certificates.title: Certificates
certificates.description: The knowledge I gain is also to be confirmed in the form of certificates of completion of courses.

otherActivities.title: Other activities
otherActivities.description: The knowledge I gain is also to be confirmed in the form of certificates of completion of courses.

constcash.title: ConstCash
constcash.description1: ConstCash is a personal finance management application. It allows you to have an advanced overview of reports and statistics, create budgets or add your own financial goals.
constcash.description2: Learn more about the application by reading

blog.title: What's new on my blog
blog.description: Education is very important to me. Learning about theory and new ways to solve problems has real benefits in practice. Advanced solutions increase productivity, solution efficiency and are often the answer to customer needs.

more.title: Want more?
more.description: I care about knowledge sharing, so I am happy to share what I know. See more topics on my blog.

contact.title: Do you want me to work for you?
contact.description: Im a mobile and web developer with various interests, I can help you with creating mobile applications or websites. I can create layout, develop app and share it to people.
